mapper.update: update student_pay set amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_lesson = #{totalLesson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_lesson = #{usedLesson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher_curriculum_id = #{teacherCurriculumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, amount, total_lesson, used_lesson, teacher_curriculum_id, student_id from student_pay

select c.name as className,sp.total_lesson,sp.used_lesson from student_pay sp left join teacher_curriculum tc on tc.id = sp.teacher_curriculum_id left join curriculum c on c.id = tc.curriculum_id where sp.student_id = #{studentId}
